label: Authentication Module
description: Authentication Module to be used generically by all the application

label: User Module
description: User Module to be used to manager user activity like login, registration etc

label: Log Module
description: Log Module is use to track different types of logs in the application

label: Setting Module
description: Setting Module to manage application level setting criteria to be used accross application

label: Communication Module
description: Communication Module to manage different types of communication accross application

label: Segment Module
description: Segment Module is used to manage different user segment to be used by different flow in the appliation

label: Message Module
description: Message Module keep tack of different types of message and error code as will be used by the application
